page.title: 03SUTTON VILLAGE
page.content: {SUTTON VILLAGE}is small and quiet, the main housing is situated on the{Woodbridge Road. { The public house called{The Plough}is the main attraction of the village. It is an old pub with wooden beams and a traditional look. It sells a variety of beverages and also serves lunch. There is also a{church}situated off the main road. It originates from the fourteenth century and it has stone walls and stain glass windows. The terrain is sandy and coniferous trees are abundant. Most of the roads are rough and sandy except the main road. Very few people live in this area with about 280 on the electoral register.
